_comment: Intents must match the locked enum in app/router_v1.js exactly.
Locked intents: GOVERNANCE_REVIEW, PLAN_WORK, SALES_INTERNAL, MARKETING_INTERNAL, PRODUCT_OFFER, OPS_INTERNAL
Default stance: unknown or missing intent → HITL (policy_gate).
To update: edit this file. No code changes required. Loader validates keys on every run.
NEVER add intents here that do not exist in router_v1.js INTENT_RULES or GOVERNANCE_REVIEW fallback.

policy_notes.tier1: PLAN_WORK, GOVERNANCE_REVIEW, OPS_INTERNAL are safe internal structural tasks — auto-execute.
policy_notes.tier2: SALES_INTERNAL and MARKETING_INTERNAL require Founder Mode flag and draft-only enforcement — not auto-executed by triage.
policy_notes.hitl: PRODUCT_OFFER is gated: pricing, scope, and offer decisions require human sign-off before execution.
policy_notes.default: Any intent not in tier1_allowed_intents is treated as HITL (policy_gate). Triage is conservative by design.
policy_notes.forbidden_phrases: Any task whose title or details contain a forbidden phrase is stopped regardless of intent. Case-insensitive match.
